_sText:
This is an old map I made for HL2 Deathmatch but re-jigged it up for CSS Deathmatch mod  with a 2fort style of map on either side. Ideally this is a team deathmatch map. There are good sniping spots as well as tight gun fights. I suppose you could also use this map for gun-game mod also as there are no buy zones. by the way high fps!

Credits to Hamster for the large Automatic Door prefab.

watch out for the death traps....

enjoy!

please provide your feedback.
